title: Ajeeb Daastaans
director: Neeraj Ghaywan, Kayoze Irani, Shashank Khaitan
writer: Neeraj Ghaywan, Shashank Khaitan, Uzma Khan
short_cast: Fatima Sana Shaikh, Jaideep Ahlawat, Armaan Ralhan, Nushrratt Bharuccha, Abhishek Banerjee, Inayat Verma, Konkona Sen Sharma, Aditi Rao Hydari, Shefali Shah, Manav Kaul, Tota Roy Chowdhury
cast: Fatima Sana Shaikh, Jaideep Ahlawat, Armaan Ralhan, Nushrratt Bharuccha, Abhishek Banerjee, Inayat Verma, Konkona Sen Sharma, Aditi Rao Hydari, Shefali Shah, Manav Kaul, Tota Roy Chowdhury
genre: Social Issue Dramas, Hindi-Language Movies, Bollywood Movies, Dramas, Independent Movies, Romantic Movies
desc: Four shorts explore the surprising ways in which unexpected catalysts inflame the uncomfortable emotions simmering under fractured relationships.
